events.question: So strange. Where did all of our cattle go?

events.text:
Do me a favour and have a look around?
I imagine the [color=#ffc740]cows[/color] haven't gotten far but be careful and don't wander too much!
Maldoror doesn't leave the barn so that gives you a head start, at least.
If you need help with [color=#ffc740]cattle[/color] numbers, look for [color=#00e529]Niki[/color].
You know how much he loves to give names to each of them.
I think Niki might be in the barn with Maldoror.

I can tell from the smell around here you found some of our cattle.
Adequate work, [color=#ff0000]VC[/color]. I would go speak to [color=#00e529]Niki[/color] in the barn once you're done.

Here is how I would go about the search:
STEP 1: Carry or throw the [color=#ffc740]cow[/color] as close to the large barn as possible
This is the fun part: pick up a [color=#ffc740]cow[/color] with Left-Click, throw with "F".
STEP 2: The [color=#ffc740]cow[/color] can be placed anywhere in the barn or just outside if that's too much work.
Drop the [color=#ffc740]cow[/color] with Left-Click again.
If the [color=#ffc740]cow[/color] makes a noise, that means the deed is done and it shouldn't wander away again.
